title: Seven o'clock news
brief_description: Shows an ABC radio announcer preparing the script of the 7 o’clock news for transmission over the ABC network. A recruiting film illustrating many aspects of the work of the the PMG Department, including the provision of communications systems for radi broadcasting and the training of Post Office personnel as telegraphists, postal clerks and technicians.
